sentences.en: Be humble, be harmless, gave no pretension, be upright, forbearing, serve you teacher in true obedience.
sentences.cn: 要谦虚, 无恶意, 不虚伪, 要正直, 宽容, 对你的老师要真正的服从.

sentences.en: By long forbearing is a prince persuaded, and a soft tongue breaketh the bone.
sentences.cn: 恒常忍耐，可以劝动君王。 柔和的舌头，能折断骨头。

sentences.en: He has a forbearing nature; he accepts trouble with a smile.
sentences.cn: 他天生容忍, 遇到麻烦都能一笑了事.

sentences.en: He would still be placid , good - tempered and forbearing.
sentences.cn: 他仍然会心平气和, 宽容忍耐.

sentences.en: I have been so far forbearing with you.
It is good to them forbearing and puts up with what they do.
sentences.cn: 圆满的爱是对所有人友善,推崇他人的善行.

sentences.en: KJV By long forbearing is a prince persuaded, and a soft tongue breaketh the bone.
sentences.cn: [新译]恒久忍耐可以劝服掌权的人, 柔和的舌头,可以折断骨头.

sentences.en: Thank you for being so forbearing.
The New Testament community was forbearing and patient with its members, embracing a love that covered a multitude of sins.
sentences.cn: New Testament 团体对其成员是宽容而且耐心的，拥抱着爱来遮掩人们的罪。

trans.tran_cn: <正>（尤指为表示礼貌或耐心而）克制，忍耐，容忍( forbear的现在分词 )
